mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aas.tb_review (show_id, user_id, retitle, content, r_date, viewcnt, empcnt) VALUES (#{show_id}, #{user_id}, #{retitle}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.rev_id, s.title as showTitle, r.retitle, r.viewcnt, r.empcnt, r.user_id, r.r_date FROM aas.tb_review r JOIN aas.tb_show s ON r.show_id = s.show_id ORDER BY r.rev_id DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
